directions: Bring a large pot of water to boil, add carrots and simmer until tender, approximately 3 to 5 minutes.  Drain and set aside.

In a large bowl, whisk together the soup, sugar, vinegar, oil, mustard and Worcestershire sauce.  Add carrots, celery, onion and pepper and toss to coat.  Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours to allow carrots to marinate.
ingredients: 1 green bell pepper, seeded and cut into strips
title: Marinated Carrot Salad
